DOC.detailed_description: In multiple sclerosis , fatigue common clinical symptom , report 97 % patient . No successful evidence-based therapy exist far . The main aim trial evaluate whether additional acupuncture mindfulness-based stress reduction efficacious usual care reduce fatigue patient multiple sclerosis . We want include 141 patient multiple sclerosis fatigue . Participants randomise three group compare 1 ) usual care , 2 ) usual care plus standardised acupuncture , 3 ) usual care plus mindfulness-based stress reduction . Treatment duration 12 week . The primary outcome Fatigue Severity Scale ( FSS ) 12 week , follow-up measurement perform 26 week . Secondary outcome include fatigue specific parameter , MS specific parameter , cost , physiological , immunological functional magnetic resonance image parameter .
